snippet.title: Scraper: Gauntlet - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Scraper: Gauntlet is now released! We hope that with a launch discount of $9.99, we'll get a chance to show you how we take this genre to the next level. It'll be $14.99 for full price afterwards!

Check out our Steam page for more: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1171130/Scraper_Gauntlet/

PLATFORMS SUPPORTED - SteamVR-Compatible Hardware:
- Vive
- Oculus Rift/Rift S
- Valve Index
- Windows Mixed Reality

If you’ve got any other questions, then follow us on our social media or comment here! We’ll have more information coming very soon about Scraper: Gauntlet, and don’t forget to WISHLIST/FOLLOW us on Steam!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LabrodexInc
FB: https://www.facebook.com/Labrodex/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/labrodexstudios
